Package io.xlorey.fluxloader.plugin

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
io.xlorey.fluxloader.plugin.Configuration
public class Configuration extends Object
Author: Deknil GitHub: https://github.com/Deknil Date: 07.02.2024 Description: A set of tools for creating plugin configuration files

FluxLoader В© 2024. All rights reserved.

  • Constructor Details

    • Configuration

      public Configuration(String configPath, Plugin plugin)
      Constructor of the Configuration class. This constructor initializes a new configuration instance for the plugin. It sets the path to the configuration file and stores a link to the plugin instance. The configuration file name is also determined based on the path provided.
      Parameters:
      configPath - Path to the configuration file that will be used to load and save data.
      plugin - The plugin instance for which the configuration is being created. This instance is used to interact with other plugin components and its environment.

  • Method Details

    • copy

      public final void copy()
      This method checks for the existence of a configuration file at the specified path in configPath. If the file does not exist, the method tries to find and copy it from the JAR file resources. If the file is not in the JAR resources or already exists in the destination folder, then nothing is done.

    • reload

      public final void reload()
      Reloads the configuration file. This method saves the current configuration to the file, then reloads the configuration from the file, effectively refreshing the configuration in memory. After reloading, the updated configuration is available for use.

    • save

      public final void save()
      Saves the current configuration to a file. The method writes the contents of the configuration stored in memory to a YAML file. The path to the configuration file is determined by the value of the configPath field. If an I/O error occurs while writing to a file. The exception is caught and output to the stacktrace, but is not thrown further.

    • load

      public final void load()
      Loads the configuration by copying the file from the JAR (if it exists in it). If the file does not exist in the JAR and folder, an empty config is created and loaded empty, otherwise the existing data is loaded. Then loads the configuration from the YAML file at the specified path in configPath. If the loaded configuration is null, nothing is done.

    • create

      public final void create()
      Checks for the existence of a configuration file and creates it if it does not exist. In case of an error, displays a stack trace.

    • isExists

      public final boolean isExists()
      Checks if the configuration file exists.
      Returns:
      true if the configuration file exists, otherwise false.

    • isEmpty

      public final boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the configuration is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the configuration is empty, otherwise false.

    • clear

      public final void clear()
      Clears the entire configuration, removing all keys and values.

    • contains

      public final boolean contains(String key)
      Checks whether the configuration contains the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to check for presence in the configuration.
      Returns:
      true if the configuration contains the specified key, otherwise false.

    • remove

      public final void remove(String key)
      Removes the specified key and its value from the configuration.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to remove from the configuration.

    • getAll

      public final Map<String,Object> getAll()
      Returns a copy of the entire configuration as Map<String, Object>.
      Returns:
      A copy of the entire configuration as Map<String, Object>.

    • merge

      public final void merge(Map<String,Object> otherConfig)
      Merges the current configuration with another configuration by adding or replacing keys and values.
      Parameters:
      otherConfig - Another configuration to merge the current configuration with.

    • merge

      public final void merge(Configuration otherConfig)
      Merges the current configuration with another configuration by adding or replacing keys and values.
      Parameters:
      otherConfig - Another configuration to merge the current configuration with.

    • getInt

      public final int getInt(String key)
      Gets the integer value for the specified configuration key. Returns 0 if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      The integer value for the key, or 0 if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setInt

      public final void setInt(String key, int value)
      Sets the integer value for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - Integer value to set.

    • getLong

      public final long getLong(String key)
      Gets the Long value for the specified configuration key. Returns 0L if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      A Long value for the key, or 0L if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setLong

      public final void setLong(String key, long value)
      Sets a Long value for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The Long value to set.

    • getShort

      public final short getShort(String key)
      Gets the Short value for the specified configuration key. Returns 0 if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      A Short value for the key, or 0 if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setShort

      public final void setShort(String key, short value)
      Sets the value of type Short to the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The Short value to set.

    • getByte

      public final byte getByte(String key)
      Gets a Byte value for the specified configuration key. Returns 0 if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      A Byte value for the key, or 0 if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setByte

      Sets a Byte value for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The Byte value to set.

    • getBoolean

      public final boolean getBoolean(String key)
      Gets a boolean value for the specified configuration key. Returns false if the value is not found or is not a boolean value.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      The boolean value for the key, or false if the key is not found or the value is not a boolean.

    • setBoolean

      public final void setBoolean(String key, boolean value)
      Sets a boolean value for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - Boolean value to set.

    • getDouble

      public final double getDouble(String key)
      Gets the floating point value (double) for the specified configuration key. Returns 0.0 if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      The floating point value for the key, or 0.0 if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setDouble

      public final void setDouble(String key, double value)
      Sets the floating point value (double) for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The floating point value to set.

    • getFloat

      public final float getFloat(String key)
      Gets the float value for the specified configuration key. Returns 0.0f if the value is not found or is not a number.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      The float value for the key, or 0.0f if the key is not found or the value is not a number.

    • setFloat

      public final void setFloat(String key, float value)
      Sets the float value for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The floating point value to set.

    • getString

      public final String getString(String key)
      Gets the configuration string value for the specified key. Returns null if the value is not found or is not a string.
      Parameters:
      key - A configuration key that can include nested levels separated by dots.
      Returns:
      The string value for the specified key, or null if the key is not found or the value is not a string.

    • setString

      public final void setString(String key, String value)
      Sets the configuration string value to the specified key.
      Parameters:
      key - A configuration key that can include nested levels separated by dots.
      value - The string value to set to the specified key.

    • getChar

      public final char getChar(String key)
      Gets the character value (char) for the specified configuration key. Returns '␀' (null character) if the value is not found or is not a character.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      The character value for the key, or '␀' if the key is not found or the value is not a character.

    • setChar

      public final void setChar(String key, char value)
      Sets the character value (char) for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      value - The character value to set.

    • getSectionKeys

      public final Set<String> getSectionKeys(String sectionKey)
      Retrieves a set of keys for the specified configuration section.
      Parameters:
      sectionKey - The configuration section key.
      Returns:
      The set of section keys, or null if the section is not found or is not a map.

    • getSectionValues

      public final Collection<Object> getSectionValues(String sectionKey)
      Gets a collection of values for the specified configuration section.
      Parameters:
      sectionKey - The configuration section key.
      Returns:
      Collection of section values as Collection<Object>, or null if the section is not found or is not a map.

    • getList

      public final List<Object> getList(String key)
      Retrieves a List of objects for the specified configuration key.
      Parameters:
      key - Configuration key.
      Returns:
      A list of objects for the key, or an empty list if the key is not found or the value is not a list.

      value - List of objects to install.
